title: Can Two League Accounts Be Merged?
body: I have three League of Legends accounts, and I really wish to play the characters on my sub accounts, but I do not want to play them on THAT account that the champion is on, because I do not play on it enough. So I was wondering if there was a way to merge my accounts, transferring all of my skins, and champions from the sub account(s) to my main account. Thank you! :)

replies.body: At the moment, we don't have a way for you to merge accounts in order to combine available champion/skin pools. With that being said, I'm interested in knowing why you're needing this to be done, there might be a way we can work something out to get you where you need to be in the long run!
